'''''Mallorn'' 12''' is the twelfth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s annual journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in [[1978]].

The issue includes a review "Opinion of Priscilla Tolkien on The Biography" (pp.&nbsp;5–6) and a reprint of J.R.R. Tolkien's early poem "[[The Battle of the Eastern Field]]" (pp.&nbsp;24–28).<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=11180|articlename=Mallorn 12. 1978|dated=|website=TB|accessed=19 September 2013}}</ref>
